structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Assessment of penalty points for speeding on limited access highway.
law.text: Conviction for any one (1) of the following moving hazardous violations on a limited access highway or a limited access highway of four (4) or more lanes in Kentucky on which the speed limit is sixty-five (65) mph or higher shall be cause for assessment of the penalty points indicated: Speeding 10 mph or less over the limit ......................................................... 0 points.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 177, sec. 4, effective July 5, 1988. -- Created 1987 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 7.
